mapper.select: select a.no, title,contents,hit,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as regDate,group_no as groupNo,order_no as orderNo,depth,user_no as userNo, b.name as userName from board a, user b where a.user_no=b.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc
